    • Method Detail

      • getResponseStatus

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response.Status getResponseStatus(Status status)
        Returns Response.Status for a given status. If the status is null or if the corresponding StatusCode is not present in the ResponseStatusMapping, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        status - The Status
        Returns:
        The Response.Status for a given status

      • getResponse

        public static javax.ws.rs.core.Response getResponse(Status status)
        Returns Response for a given status. If the status provided is null or if the corresponding StatusCode is not present in the ResponseStatusMapping, it returns Response with StatusType as INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.
        Parameters:
        status - The Status
        Returns:
        The Response for a given status.

      • isAuthorized

        public static boolean isAuthorized(java.lang.String userName,
                   java.lang.String containerName,
                   Privilege required,
                   java.lang.Object bundle)
        Returns whether the current user has the required privilege on the specified container
        Parameters:
        userName - The user name
        containerName - The container name
        required - Operation to be performed - READ/WRITE
        bundle - Class from where the function is invoked
        Returns:
        The Status of the request, either Success or Unauthorized
